title: As a former Galio player, it feels like they just Lucario'd me
body:
Remember when Lucario replaced Mewtwo in smash? Remember how people were pissed that Mewtwo was gone? Yeah, that's how I feel right now.

I used to play Galio so much. I loved his look. I loved his design. His color scheme. His legendary skin, which I bought as soon as it came out.

I've just been Lucario'd. And I'm not happy about it. I forget which season it was, but he was one of my most played champions that season.
